item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Evgeniy! I’m Ruby Developer with a half year experience. Programming is my great passion and hobby, even from school I was engaged in self-education and learned to build websites and programs. Then I finished university by ‘Computer systems and network’ specialization. I want to work with people who share my interests and strive for constant development, the creation of their projects, etc. I have good communication skills, also I’m interested in architecture, high load, functional programming.

item.title: CV
item.description: Education Computer systems and networks | Sevastopol State Technical University | 2016 Skills Ruby Ruby On Rails Git SQL Linux Docker Work Experience 404Group | 02.2019 - 04.2019 Using GitLab, Docker, Jira. API development. Writing API documentation. Writing logic coverage tests. Programming under the direction and code review of the team lead and mentor from mkdev. GetSimpleAdmin.com | 09.2018 - 12.2018 Writing complex business logic. Using version control tool Git and code storage tool Gitlab for added application functionality.
